definitions.definition: An article of jewelry that is worn around the neck , most often made of a string of precious metal , pearls , gems , beads or shells , and sometimes having a pendant attached.
Anything resembling a necklace in shape.
A device used in necklacing (an informal execution ); a rubber tyre that is filled with petrol . It is placed around the victim 's chest and arms, and set on fire .

main_definition: ( jewelry ) An article of jewelry that is worn around the neck , most often made of a string of precious metal , pearls , gems , beads or shells , and sometimes having a pendant attached.
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively ) Anything resembling a necklace in shape.
( South Africa ) A device used in necklacing (an informal execution ); a rubber tyre that is filled with petrol . It is placed around the victim 's chest and arms, and set on fire .
